data.actual_result: You are taken to the server, but in the latest channel you visited, since you visited `channel-b` at step 3 then you will be taken to `channel-b`, regardless of the actual channel the invite points to. This also mean that if you post the link in the same server but in a different channel, the Joined button won't work at all
data.expected_result: You should be taken to the channel the invite points to, in this case `channel-a`
data.short_description: When tapping the "Joined" button of an invite embed to a server you are already in, it switches to the server but doesn't switch to the channel the invite points to
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a server with two channels: `channel-a` and `channel-b` - Create an instant invite that points to `channel-a` - Switch to `channel-b` - Switch to a different server and post the invite link - Tap the "Joined" button
